channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Virginia Giuffre, who accused Prince Andrew in Epstein sex trafficking scandal, has died

item.title: Justice Department revokes Biden-era protections for reporters in leak investigations

item.title: Jury finds Joseph Koenig guilty of murder in deadly rock-throwing trial

item.title: Virginia Giuffre, Prince Andrew and Jeffrey Epstein accuser, dies
item.description: Giuffre alleged she was trafficked to the Duke of York when she was 17, which he has strenuously denied.

item.title: DR Congo and Rwanda vow to agree peace plan within days
item.description: The two neighbouring nations sign a US-brokered deal aimed at stopping the fighting in eastern DR Congo.

item.title: George Santos sentenced to over 7 years on fraud charges
item.description: George Santos was sentenced to more than seven years in prison on federal wire fraud and identity theft charges Friday in New York.

item.title: How much has Elon Musk's Doge cut from US government spending?
item.description: BBC Verify has looked at the agency's biggest claimed savings, examining the figures and speaking to experts.

item.title: Mangione's supporters rally outside NYC court as he pleads not guilty
item.description: Luigi Mangione pleaded not guilty Friday to federal murder and stalking charges.

item.title: Russia and Ukraine 'very close to a deal', says Trump
item.description: The US president's envoy meets Vladimir Putin in Moscow, while Ukraine calls for more pressure on Russia.

item.title: 4/25: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Breaking down FBI arrest of Wisconsin judge accused of obstruction in immigration case; Reporter's Notebook: Eulogizing Pope Francis

item.title: Government says - for now - it will restore international students' status
item.description: International students had filed dozens of lawsuits after the government removed them from a database crucial for maintaining their legal status.

item.title: New senior staff announced as White House looks to 'right the ship' at the Pentagon

item.title: US judge arrested after allegedly obstructing immigration enforcement
item.description: Judge Hannah Dugan is accused of trying to help an undocumented immigrant who appeared in her court avoid arrest.

item.title: ICE is reversing the termination of legal status for international students around the US
